items.name: Quench the ever lasting thirst of McMingus
items.overview: This customer seems a bit off kilter, and I'm meant to be closing! maybe if I bring him a drink it'll sort him out and he'll go away
items.on_complete: Okay wow this guy seems to be insatiable, and we are not getting on to option 3, time to switch gears

stages.description: Go to the bar, grab a beer
I've got the beer, now to deliver it to McMingus, who has become visibly exited
Go to the bar, grab a wine
Okay, got the wine, let's take it to McMingus, who is absolutely losing it with glee

items.name: get rid of McMingus
items.overview: Okay this character is never going to leave, maybe I can trick him out the door so I can close up
items.on_complete: Wow okay thank god for that

stages.description: Go to the bar, grab a beer
